member.name: D3D12_PROTECTED_SESSION_STATUS
member.summary: Defines constants that specify protected session status.

member.name: D3D12_PROTECTED_SESSION_STATUS.D3D12_PROTECTED_SESSION_STATUS_OK
member.summary: Indicates that the protected session is in a valid state.

member.name: D3D12_PROTECTED_SESSION_STATUS.D3D12_PROTECTED_SESSION_STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Indicates that the protected session is not in a valid state.
